def rs(x):
    p=x[0]
    for i in range(len(x)-1):
        x[i]=x[i+1]
    x[len(x)-1]=p
    return(x)

def ls(x):
    p=x[-1]
    for i in range(len(x)-1,0,-1):
    	x[i]=x[i-1]

    x[0]=p
    return(x)

def number(x):
    num=0
    for i in range(len(x)):
        num+=x[len(x)-1-i]*10**i
    return(num)


def ld(n):
    x=[]
    while n>0:
        x.append(n%10)
        n=n//10
    y=[]
    for i in range(len(x)):
        y.append(x[len(x)-1-i])
    return(y)

def digrot():
    t=int(raw_input())
    for i in range(t):
        n=int(raw_input())
        p=len(str(n))
        a=[]
        nl=number(ls(ld(n)))
        nr=number(rs(ld(n)))
        nlr=number(ls(ld(number(rs(ld(n))))))
        nrl=number(rs(ld(number(ls(ld(n))))))
        for j in range(p):
            a.append(nlr)
            nlr=number(ls(ld(number(rs(ld(n))))))
            a.append(nrl)
            nrl=number(rs(ld(number(ls(ld(nrl))))))
            a.append(nl)
            nl=number(ls(ld(nl)))
            a.append(nr)
            nr=number(rs(ld(nr)))
        print(max(a))

if __name__=="__main__":
        digrot()
